summary: A small, lore-friendly and rig-friendly overhaul to Dawnstar using only vanilla and DLC assets!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff][size=6][u][center]ClefJ's Dawnstar[color=#ffffff][size=3]
[/size][/color][/center][/u][/size][/color][center][color=#00ffff][size=6][u]
[/u][/size][/color]Author's Note: I'm terribly sorry about the broken navmesh; A fixed version from DaveMoney is here:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/bsnvl03hlvdl5uh/ClefJs_Dawnstar-Fixed_NavMesh.7z

Okay, that annoying thing where 'backspace' actually refreshes the page and you lose all your work? I need to stop doing that. Let's try again, I'm sorry for making it brief. [/center][center]Er-hem. Hello friends! Welcome to another ClefJ town overhaul, where I am nothing if not consistent in that I make performance-friendly and visually appealing mods. Indeed, as much as I love JK's and Hold's work on these towns, I felt the need again to make something in my own fashion. You should feel cozy in this snowier, busier port that shows its history.
[i]
[color=#00ff00]What the town offers: [/color][/i]
- A visual overhaul that suggests Dawnstar was indeed a [i]garrison [/i]town, held a number of fishermen and stood against a siege of 'ice tribes'.
- The new gates show ancient walls overcome by snow and time.
- A new bunkhouse for miners, and a new General Goods store!
- A second ship and loading crane at the expanded docks. Better NPC's maybe in the future.
- Quicksilver Mine and its mountain have been moved back a few meters to offer more workroom away from the tide.
- Minor landscape changes, including a little creek in town.
- The White Hall has been turned into an actual [i]longhouse[/i], built over the ruins of the Snow Elves, to make it seem apparent that the ice tribes were invading over the issue of settling over their land.
- All cabins now have chimneys! That bugged the heck out of me for some reason in vanilla skyrim.
- A new player home! And minor detailwork to the rest of town.
All made using vanilla assets! Should make it easier for this to be ported over to SSE Console mods.

[color=#00ff00][i]What the player home offers:[/i][/color]
- A lovely layout heavily inspired by FlahoShi's Eagle's Nest.
- Multiple Adoption friendly.
- A fancy throne why not.
The key to the home lies in the lover's tent on the coastline! Otherwise, just an adept lock to claim the home.

Requires:
- Dragonborn, Dawnguard and Hearthfire
[color=#ff0000]Compatibility issues: [/color]
- There are navmesh edits. I know, I'm sorry. Gotta be honest.
- Any changes to Dawnstar. Obviously.
- It's been brought to my attention that there are a few navmesh finalization issues here. Unfortunately I'm bogged down with other projects, so I certainly give permission to anyone who think they can fix the issue.

[color=#00ffff]Good News![/color]
- Compatible with a great deal of Dawnstar player homes, including Morskom Estate.
- Friendly to Interesting NPC's.
NOW COMPATIBLE with Fast Travel Overhaul!

Thank you for taking a look, I hope you enjoy! Updates, fixes and such may come more promptly than in my other works. Heh.[/center]
author: ClefJ
